page.title: 11FIRE FIGHTING SCHOOL
page.content: The Airport Fire Training School was established in l949 by the then Ministry of Aviation and it was moved to Teesside Airport in l982. It is{one of only two schools}in the world. Even so, the second, Hong Kong, sends recruits for the final part of training to Teesside to use the modern equipment. Over the 36 years of training, over l8,OOO students have passed through the school, including representatives from{82 countries. At the moment, the employees include one senior instructor, 6 instructional staff as well as maintenance staff, engineers, fitters and 3 clerical staff. The school and the garages are housed in converted RAF buildings.
